ComicInfo.Summary:
Kiani has risen! Kiani severs her ties with Luzhin and the Volna after discovering the true dangers such a powerful research facility is capable of. However, her escape does not go according to plan-as the Russians prove they are not easily dissuaded from their attempts to become the world's greatest nation-even if it means killing her in the process!
*List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |-------|----------------------------|--------------------------------|------------------| | A | Direct Edition | Giuseppe Cafaro & Wes Hartman | 1 | | B | Direct Edition | Dawn McTeigue & Sabine Rich | 2 | | C | Retailer Incentive Edition | Jordan Gunderson & Wes Hartman | 3 |
ComicInfo.Title: True Intentions
